import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './TeamCard.css' import TeamGraph from './TeamGraph' import {db} from '../../services/firebase' const TeamExpand = (props) => { //props const labelArr = props.labelArr const pricesArr = props.pricesArr const shares = props.shares const user = props.user const t = props.t console.log(props) //States const [paidForShares, setPaidForShares] = useState(25) const [winPayoutsValue, setWinPayoutsValue] = useState(1) return(
Your Position
Shares: {shares}
Avg Cost: ${(paidForShares / shares).toFixed(2)}
Value: ${(t.lastSoldPrice * shares).toFixed(2)}
Portfolio Diversity: {((t.lastSoldPrice * shares)/user.totalValue).toFixed(2)}%
Share Return
$21.72 [ 5.90% ]
Win Payout Returm
$9.60 [ 2.61% ]
Total Return
$31.32 [ 8.50% ]
Stats
52 Week High
${t.yearHigh.toFixed(2)}
52 Week Low
${t.yearLow.toFixed(2)}
52 Week Payout
${t.league = 'NBA' ? (t.wins * 0.10).toFixed(2) : (t.wins * 0.50).toFixed(2)}
Team Cap
${(t.sharesOutstanding * t.lastSoldPrice).toFixed(2)}
Price/Wins
{(t.lastSoldPrice / t.wins).toFixed(2)}
Win Payout %
{t.league = 'NBA' ? ((0.10 / t.lastSoldPrice)*100).toFixed(2) : ((0.50 / t.lastSoldPrice)*100).toFixed(2)}%
) } export default TeamExpand
